summary: The conversation is between a customer and a relationship manager from the "Lending Club" platform, where the customer has made an investment in P2P lending. The manager is calling the customer to check on their investment experience.
questions_asked:
- The customer was asked if this was their first time investing in P2P lending, to which they responded that it was.
- The manager asked if the customer had any doubts or questions about P2P lending, to which the customer replied that they did not have any at the moment, but would call the manager if any doubts arise in the future.
overall_sentiment:
Positive
The conversation is cordial, and the customer seems satisfied with the investment and open to reaching out to the manager if they have any questions or concerns in the future.
